artist: Wenceslaus Hollar; After a follower of Hans Holbein the Younger
creditline: Gift of Elizabeth, Julie, and Catherine Andrus in memory of John and Marion Andrus
inscription:
Inscription, Watermark

inscribed in plate at bottom: [Christ beares his Crosse, and by a monke is led / With all his fellowes to bee crucified / the Ladder, popes Crosse, Banner borne before / With pilgrims staues the while they beate him fore, ]

numbered in plate at lower right: [12]
provenance: John E. Andrus III, Wayzata, Minn.; by descent to his daughters, Elizabeth, Katie, and Julie; gave to MIA, 2015. Earlier provenances have been gathered, but further research will increase our knowledge of their histories.
title: Christ Carrying the Cross, From the Satirical Passion
